title: Before and After
prompt: Draw an object before and after it has been used.
goal: Notice small changes caused by use.
howTo: Split the page into two parts. Keep the object the same size in both drawings.

title: Only the Outline
prompt: Draw an object using only its outer outline.
howTo: Move your pencil slowly around the edge. Do not add details.

title: One Continuous Line
prompt: Draw an object using one continuous line.
howTo: Do not lift your pencil. Look at the object, not the paper.

title: Upside Down
prompt: Draw an object upside down.
howTo: Turn the object or image upside down and draw what you see.

title: Two Angles
prompt: Draw the same object from two different angles.
howTo: Split the page in half and rotate the object slightly.

title: Close-Up Detail
prompt: Draw one small part of an object very large.
howTo: Let one corner or detail fill the page.

title: Cut Off
prompt: Draw an object so part goes off the page.
howTo: Let the object extend beyond the paper edges.

title: Touch Points
prompt: Draw only where an object touches the surface.
howTo: Ignore the rest of the object.

title: Big and Small
prompt: Draw the same object once very big and once very small.
howTo: Use most of the page for one, a small area for the other.

title: Blind Drawing
prompt: Draw an object without looking at your paper.
howTo: Keep eyes on the object the whole time.

title: Edges Over Time
prompt: Draw worn edges of an object.

title: Before Cleaning
prompt: Draw an object before and after cleaning.
howTo: Split page into two equal sections.

title: Inside and Outside
prompt: Draw the inside and outside of the same object.
howTo: Use a cutaway or split page.

title: Shadow Shapes
prompt: Draw only the shadow shapes of an object.

title: From Below
prompt: Draw an object as seen from below.
howTo: Change your position and draw carefully.

title: From Above
prompt: Draw an object as seen from above.
howTo: Look straight down at the object.

title: Only Corners
prompt: Draw only the corners or joints of an object.

title: Slow Look
prompt: Spend one minute looking, then draw slowly.

title: Memory Then Look
prompt: Draw from memory, then add after observing.

title: Overlapping Objects
prompt: Draw two objects overlapping.

title: Negative Space
prompt: Draw the space around an object.

title: Partial View
prompt: Draw only half of an object.
howTo: Let the viewer imagine the rest.

title: Repeated Object
prompt: Draw the same object three times.

title: Loose Then Careful
prompt: Draw once loosely, once carefully.

title: Final Observation
prompt: Draw an object of your choice slowly.

title: Before and After Magic
prompt: Draw an object before and after magic changes it.

title: Secret Inside
prompt: Draw an object with something hidden inside.

title: Strange Version
prompt: Draw a normal object in a strange version.

title: Future Version
prompt: Draw a common object from the future.

title: Object With Feelings
prompt: Draw an object showing an emotion.

title: Pocket World
prompt: Draw a tiny world that fits in your pocket.

title: Living Object
prompt: Draw an everyday object as if alive.

title: Creature With a Job
prompt: Draw a creature with a simple job.

title: Tool for One Task
prompt: Draw a tool for one specific task.

title: Room Inside Room
prompt: Draw a room hidden inside another room.

title: Object That Grows
prompt: Draw an object that grows over time.

title: Object That Shrinks
prompt: Draw an object shrinking.

title: Moving Furniture
prompt: Draw furniture that moves.

title: Friendly Machine
prompt: Draw a machine meant to help.

title: Strange Vehicle
prompt: Draw a vehicle for an unusual place.

title: Object With Memory
prompt: Draw an object that remembers its past.

title: Temporary Object
prompt: Draw an object meant to disappear.

title: Object That Reacts
prompt: Draw an object reacting to weather.

title: Tiny Helper
prompt: Draw a tiny helper creature.

title: New Use
prompt: Draw an object used in a new way.

title: Dream Version
prompt: Draw an object from a dream.

title: Broken and Fixed
prompt: Draw an object broken and then fixed.

title: Object With Sound
prompt: Draw an object that makes a sound.

title: Object That Floats
prompt: Draw an object that floats.

title: Final Imagination
prompt: Draw an object of your choice imaginatively.
